landing.noapp: App hman tur i mamawh lo {{ BRAND }} i phone emaw tablet emaw ah!
landing.intro: {{BRAND}} ({{TRANSLITERATION}}) tih hi á¹­hian thar nena inhmuhna tha tak a ni.  {{ BRAND }}, random takin midang kan thlang a, one-to-one in inbiakna kan phalsak che a ni.   <6>Thuthlung leh thupek</6>, leh <8>Khawtlang inkaihhruaina</8> for info about de do's leh don'ts in hman dan tur {{ BRAND }}. {{ BRAND }} video chat hi AI moderated ni mahse moderation engmah perfects a ni lo.  {{ BRAND }}
landing.disclaimer: <0>I hman tur chuan kum 18 (or i jurisdiction-a legal majority) emaw a aia upa emaw i ni tur a ni {{BRAND}}</0>.  {{BRAND}}'s <4>Thuthlung leh thupek</4> info tam zawk hriat duh tan.  <6>https://www.connectsafely.org/controls</6> chutiang bawkin site dangte pawh an awm bawk.
landing.pleaseleave: Khawngaihin Lamdazle chhuahsan la, chu chu i zawn chu a nih a, kum 18 (or i jurisdiction-a legal majority) emaw a aia upa i nih chuan puitling site tlawh zawk rawh.
landing.termscheck: Box-a i check hian agree to be bound by i enfiah tih i pawm a ni {{BRAND}}'s <3>Thuthlung leh thupek</3>, . <5>Thuruk humhalh dan tur</5> leh <7>Khawtlang inkaihhruaina</7>.
landing.agecheck: Kum 18 hnuai lam emaw, i ram chhunga legal majority i nih chuan he service hi i hmang thei lo vang.  <1>Thuthlung leh thupek</1> info tam zawk hriat duh tan. <3>Box-a i check hian kum 18 (or i jurisdiction-a legal majority) emaw a aia upa i nih thu i pawm a, i entir bawk.</3>
